__e: SO MUCH, DEAREST FRIENDS, IS TO COME TO LIGHT!
I wish you health, dear friends, and your plants! Good luck to all!
Well, my dear friends, I want no part of it.
We would like to present to you, our dear visitors and guests, our new game THE TOWING MISSION.
How dear and sweet they all are to me.
Dear Brothers and Sisters, Good morning!
As our minister always said: " Dear brothers and sisters... the only things we can take away from this Earthly life... are those we have given away."
Dear Brothers and Sisters, Good morning!
Yet, one night, sleepless as usual with grief at the fate of my dear mother and my dear brothers...
My friends... dear brethren in Christ... my mother... and the other members of my family, who have traveled so far for this occasion.
Thus, my dear brethren, listen to what I say to you
1312 Mother of Salvation: Courage, my dear children, all is in the Hands of my Son
For you know the truth in your heart, my dear children that it is up to us to fight the good fight
Oh, my babies, shame on you!
Now that we're done with dinner, I'd like to make a toast to our loved ones who weren't fortunate enough to be here with us.
Lucky are the nearest and the dearest of ours, who died before us.

Especially for you, our dear readers, we have written a small greeting in verse. We really appreciate all of you for what you show interest in our resource and closely monitor the updates that we prepare for you with great pleasure.
No, dear readers, the actress has not been taken ill, but said she was visiting a friend .
Good health to you, dear readers of our site!
